# Hi there

I'm Julia; I also go by Julie. 

I'm a marine ecologist and founded Openscapes to champion kinder, better science in less time. <br>My main focus is how open source, data science, and environmental research can empower us to uncover climate solutions faster by working together as inclusive teams and communities. I am an active part of the open science movement.

<br>

# Experience

- 2018-present: Founder & Co-Director, Openscapes. Senior Fellow, National Center for Ecological Analysis & Synthesis (NCEAS), University of California Santa Barbara (UCSB)
- 2018-2019: Mozilla Fellow
- 2013-2019: Ocean Health Index science program lead, NCEAS, UCSB
- 2012: PhD, Stanford University: Drivers and impacts of Humboldt squid in a changing climate
